Monster ID7792

Long-tailed Wyverns are Slayer monsters that require a Slayer level of 66 in order to be harmed. They reside in the Wyvern Cave on Fossil Island. Like with other Wyverns, an elemental, mind, dragonfire or ancient wyvern shield provides significant protection against their icy breath, and they are vulnerable to the effects of dragonbane weapons. These monsters require completion of the Bone Voyage quest to be assigned as a Slayer task.

Locations[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Spawns Map
Wyvern Cave1528Maplink

There are two different wyvern caves - one where players can freely slay them, and one for those that have been assigned a Slayer task of Fossil Island wyverns. The task-only cave is reached via the trapdoor found in the Mushroom Forest, and the regular cave is found south of the Museum Camp. If a player attempts to attack the wyverns in the northern cave without a Fossil Island wyvern Slayer task, Weve (Steve's son) will stop them from doing so.

Drops[edit | edit source]

Drop rates estimated based on 95,043 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The average Long-tailed Wyvern kill is worth 10,957.09.

The average Long-tailed Wyvern kill while on a Konar task is worth 12,554.05.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
26 March 2020
(update | poll)

The Long-tailed Wyvern's aggression range has been reduced.

12 July 2018
(update | poll)

Long-tailed Wyverns now drop a maximum of 12 seaweed spores instead of 6.

18 January 2018
(update)

The Long-tailed Wyvern's Defence level has been reduced from 120 to 90, changing its combat level from 159 to 152.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • They appear to use all attack styles when using melee, depending on the animation they use: slashing when they use their talons, stabbing when they jab with their tail and crushing when they bite the target.

References[edit | edit source]

  3. ^ Jagex. Mod Tide's Twitter account. 24 May 2019. (Archived from the original on 24 May 2019.) Mod Tide: "I know its been a while since the clue expansion but here is the information on clue scroll drop rates and loot chances! If anything changes I will keep you posted."
  4. ^ Jagex. Mod Maz's Twitter account. 9 October 2017. (Archived from the original on 25 March 2019.) Mod Maz: "Wyvern Visage is 1/12k for normals and 1/10k for ancients."
